automatic-alerts.content: Automatic exchange rate alerts, with realistic investment opportunities, from a database containing only the strongest companies. It is not necessary to deal with individual watch lists or graph analyzes on a daily basis in order not to miss the next Nvidia, Apple or Coca Cola buy opportunities
automatic-alerts.li1: Daily stock trading data of the 150 strongest US companies
automatic-alerts.li3: 40+ technical entry points with related explanations
automatic-alerts.li4: Support for 4 medium and long-term investment strategies
automatic-alerts.title: Automatic alerts

investor-academy.content: Short investor theoretical knowledge base for more confident management of investments:
investor-academy.li1: How should you start your own (digital) asset management?

investor-academy.li3: Long-term portfolio building rules with various tools from government securities to ETFs to individual shares

investor-academy.li6: Management of my investment schedule with the use of the services of GastroTrader
investor-academy.title: Investor academy
